rules_text:
Artillery [i](This creature gets +1/+1 for each Equipment attached to it.)[/i]
Vallen Foglurker can't be blocked.
flavor_text: [i]They scour the riverbanks for intruders, carrying with them daggers, spears, and arrows. Each weapon is capable of killing a man with a single strike, and their tips are poisoned for good measure.[/i]
